dimensions: Warp: 43 cm (17 in.). Weft: 56 cm (22 in.). Right selvedge present.
title: Chef de piece
provenance: Formerly in the collection of Elinor Merrell where it was No. 20 on her list of chefs de piece.
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by block on plain weave foundation. Different blocks for red and black.
description: Large flowers alternate with ribbon-tied floral sprigs and torsades of 'folded' lace. Red and black on white.
name: Chef de piece
